name: Nuclear War Defense
description:
The world is enshrouded by nuclear warfare. You are the leader of the last developed civilization, and you must protect the only bastion of knowledge left, the Library of GDX. Can you defend this precious artifact from attack?

Use Mouse to shoot, press Space to use a nuke (you only have 3)!

Developed by Ryan Shaw for the libGDX March Game Jam: GLOBAL THERMONUCLEAR WAR.
